fields.description:
Description: 
While testing KitchenSink,Base UI>Nav Group, I noticed that the iPad has a red background to the modal window, while the other devices were grey. Turns out the iPad was the only correct one of the 4 devices in test. A check of the code  (navgroup.js) shows:
var modalWin = Ti.UI.createWindow({
	backgroundColor:"red"
});

Steps to reproduce: 
1) Install KS onto device 
2) Navigate to Base UI>Nav Group
3) Examine the background

Result: 
Color is grey

Expected Result:
Color is red

Notes:
OCCURS in 1.6.2
Blain mentions that this seems to be due to a clear versus colored background for the grouped table view.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink: Base UI>Nav Group, Code sets modal window background to "red" but only iPad shows the setting
fields.environment: Verizon iPhone 4 (4.2.8), iPhone 3GS (3.1.2) , iPod Touch 3rd Gen (4.0.2) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201106011734, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X rc9515533

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
